text:
We are pleased to announce that City is taking part in #thisbucsgirlcan week, a campaign aimed at providing opportunities for women to try out activities they may not have had the opportunity to try before. 
We kicked the week off with an Introduction to Free Weights session at lunch üí™üèºmore free sessions will be taking place throughout the week for female City students so have a browse at the timetable and sign up via sports@city.ac.uk üèÉüèΩ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
#sport #citysport #gym #weights #fitness #thisgirlcan

text: This is the story of Catherine Pine, a suffragette-supporting nurse who trained at St Bartholomew‚Äôs Hospital (now part of @cityuniversitylondon). Pine was an ally of Emmeline Pankhurst and nursed the suffragette leader back to health after hunger strike. http://ow.ly/wICm50jyAE4 [link also in bio]#citymagazine18 #womensrights #suffragette #emmelinepankhurst #feminist #nursing

text:
Locations of London 20: Somerset House.
As the weather gets colder and the nights longer, we felt it only correct to get into the festive mood with a bit of Ice Skating at Somerset House. Every year @somersethouse hosts one of London‚Äôs largest ice skating rings, with @fortnums mulled wine and mince pies to keep you in the festive mood. 
#somersethouse #holidays #iceskating #mulledwine #mincepies #christmas #festive #feelingfestive #coldnights #winter #fortnumandmason #cass #cassbusinessschool
